content.raw:
Hi Thomas,

I observed both of these issues on my teammates machines - so i can't be sure about what I saw. But given the GPU lidar is new, its possible that edge cases might have been missed.

Maybe all im asking is that you keep and eye out for this. I'll try to confirm (C) if I see it myself.

Hi Thomas,

I observed both of these issues on my teammates machines - so i can't be sure about what I saw. But given the GPU lidar is new, its possible that edge cases might have been missed.
